statements: DELETE FROM query_anomalies WHERE anomaly_detected = TRUE
DELETE FROM query_anomalies WHERE query_id = 100 AND anomaly_detected = TRUE;
DELETE FROM query_anomalies WHERE query_text LIKE '%error%'
DELETE FROM investigation_table WHERE id = (SELECT MIN(id) FROM investigation_table);
DELETE FROM queries WHERE id = 10 AND user_id = 5;
DELETE FROM anomalies WHERE id = 1 AND data_source = 'Sensor A';
DELETE FROM anomalies WHERE anomaly_type = 'Outlier' AND id = 2;
